00001 """Tests for httplib2 when the socket module is missing.
00002 
00003 This helps ensure compatibility with environments such as AppEngine.
00004 """
00005 import os
00006 import sys
00007 import unittest
00008 
00009 import httplib2
00010 
00011 class MissingSocketTest(unittest.TestCase):
00012     def setUp(self):
00013         self._oldsocks = httplib2.socks
00014         httplib2.socks = None
00015 
00016     def tearDown(self):
00017         httplib2.socks = self._oldsocks
00018 
00019     def testProxyDisabled(self):
00020         proxy_info = httplib2.ProxyInfo('blah',
00021                                         'localhost', 0)
00022         client = httplib2.Http(proxy_info=proxy_info)
00023         self.assertRaises(httplib2.ProxiesUnavailableError,
00024                           client.request, 'http://localhost:-1/')
